name: The Bizalions' Ratatouille
keywords: eggplant, tomato, side dish, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt, pepper and fresh thyme to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the eggplant and salt it lightly. Set aside for a half hour, then wipe the salt off with a paper towel. Cut the peppers lengthwise into strips. Slice the remaining vegetables. Add enough olive oil to fill the bottom of a heavy pot 1/8-inch deep. Add the onions and cook on a low flame until soft but not brown. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. While stirring, add the zucchini, eggplant, tomatoes, basil and thyme. Cook for 45 minutes to an hour on low heat. Serve hot or cold.
